# Numbered and unnumbered headings

## Numbered headings

Numbered headings can be turned on using numbered_sections: true

## Unnumbered headings {-}

Headings can be unnumbered by adding the attribute - or .unnumbered to them.
E.g. # heading {-}

This makes use of pandoc markdow header attributes extension.

## headings in table of contents

Unnumbered headings will still appear in the table of contents.
